data.eml:eml: Description of a new species of the genus Tophoderes Dejean (Coleoptera: Anthribidae) from east Madagascar, with images of all Madagascan species of the genus

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Trýzna, Miloš (2017): Description of a new species of the genus Tophoderes Dejean (Coleoptera: Anthribidae) from east Madagascar, with images of all Madagascan species of the genus. Zootaxa 4221 (3): 377-385, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.250320
